CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Please describe in here why probability should be reduced. e.g. 1) Uncertainty on order date (i.e. waiting for client budget approval or order date has been moved more than 3 times) ; 2) Our quote is only used for comparison against a (preferred) competitor; 3) Other: please specify
Please note that by selecting reduced probability, the probability will be reduced by 25% to a minimum of 5%.
CustomField.label: Reason for reduced probability
